definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: China is implementing a family planning policy. So I'm the only child in my family.
sentences.chinese: 中國正在實施計劃生育政策，所以我是家中的獨生子。

sentences.english: Bearing and rearing better children is an important part of the birth control policy of our country.
sentences.chinese: 優育是我國計劃生育政策的一個重要內容。

sentences.english: Family planning in Xiaotun village is deemed a success.
sentences.chinese: 小屯村被認爲是計劃生育的成功典型。

sentences.english: Present family planning policy has caused many disharmonies.
sentences.chinese: 現行計劃生育政策，造成了諸多的不和諧。

sentences.english: If nonperformance family planning, this day perhaps can come 4 years ahead of schedule.
sentences.chinese: 如果不實行計劃生育，這一天也許會提前4年到來。

sentences.english: After three decades, the drawbacks of the one-child policy are more and more apparent.
sentences.chinese: 三十多年後，計劃生育政策弊端漸顯。

sentences.english: And no aid to the United Nations Population Fund, which supports family-planning services.
sentences.chinese: 不向支持計劃生育的聯合國人口基金會捐款。

sentences.english: The editorial invests heavily in a family planning policy.
sentences.chinese: 該社論用很大篇幅闡述計劃生育政策。

sentences.english: We will provide good family planning services for the floating population.
sentences.chinese: 做好流動人口計劃生育服務工作。

sentences.english: Chapter five suggests counter measures of innovating benefit-oriented mechanism in the population and family planning work.
sentences.chinese: 第五章創新計劃生育利益導向機制的對策建議。

sentences.english: We will improve the family planning management and service system for the floating population.
sentences.chinese: 完善流動人口計劃生育管理服務體系。

sentences.english: So it is very important to bring family planning program within the orbit of legality.
sentences.chinese: 因此，把計劃生育工作納入法制的軌道顯得尤爲重要。

sentences.english: Dingbian Huangwan Township Family Planning Office .
sentences.chinese: 定邊縣黃灣鄉計劃生育辦公室。

sentences.english: Chinese Gen Ys are single children born under China's one-child policy.
sentences.chinese: 代是在中國計劃生育國策下出生的獨生子女。

sentences.english: Why do you carry on the one-child family policy?
sentences.chinese: 你們爲什麼還要實行只生一個孩子的計劃生育政策？

sentences.english: The family planning is one of the basic (national) policies of our country.
sentences.chinese: 計劃生育是我國的一項基本國策。

definition: a couple where both spouses are not Hong Kong citizens
to carry on one's ancestral line
medical insurance/abbr. for 醫療保險|医疗保险[yi1 liao2 bao3 xian3]
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
ability to make one's own decisions
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
